pageContext.description:
A full-length portrait facing right. The sitter is shown wearing an offical coat and hat, with a short sword, the blade of which is chased with interlacing strapwork. He has a reddisch blond pointed beard and stands in front od a stone-grey niche on a tiled ivory coloured floor. In the upper corners, left: coloured electoral coat-of-arms in yellowish scrollwork, right coloured coat-of-arms of the burgraviate of Magdeburg. 

[Lutherhaus Wittenberg, revised 2012]
pageContext.dimensions:
Dimensions of support: 217 x 106 cm

[Kolb 2005 B, 105]
pageContext.inscription:
- on the sword: 
'+ M./ D.S.E.E./ 1547'

- bottom: 
'INSTAVRAVIT'

[Lutherhaus Wittenberg, revised 2012]
